title: CEP Campaign Finance Contribution Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of campaign finance contributions and receipts.

terms.label: Individual Contribution
terms.definition: A contribution received from a natural person, including joint contributions from spouses.

terms.label: Party Committee Contribution
terms.definition: A contribution received from a political party committee.

terms.label: Other Committee Contribution
terms.definition: A contribution received from a political committee that is not a party committee.

terms.label: Loan Received
terms.definition: A loan received by the committee, including candidate loans and bank loans.

terms.label: In-kind Contribution
terms.definition: A non-monetary contribution of goods or services measured at fair market value.

terms.label: Transfer In
terms.definition: Funds transferred into the committee from another committee under common control or within a party structure.

terms.label: Refund or Rebate
terms.definition: A refund or rebate received by the committee from a vendor, payee, or previous recipient.

terms.label: Other Receipt
terms.definition: A receipt that does not fit any more specific contribution or transfer type.
